original_title: What Is the 'Best' Evidence That God Created
overview: The most popular talk by one of AIG's most popular speakers! Audiences nationwide have been thrilled with this energetic, eye-catching presentation on some of the most astounding evidences of God's handiwork. Carl Kerby builds to an unforgettable conclusion: the life-changing truth that the best evidence is God's Word itself!
title: What Is the 'Best' Evidence That God Created
